trans-unit.source: Provides information about a user profile.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni su un profilo utente.

trans-unit.source: The ProfileInfo class is used to represent information about a user profile from the data store, including the last date and time when profile properties were retrieved or updated, the user name associated with the profile, and whether the profile is for an anonymous or authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: La classe ProfileInfo viene utilizzata per rappresentare le informazioni relative a un profilo utente dall'archivio dati, tra cui la data e ora sono state recuperate le proprietà del profilo o aggiornato, il nome utente associato al profilo, l'ultima e se il profilo è associato a un utente autenticato o anonimo.

trans-unit.source: ProfileInfo objects are constructed and returned as part of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetti ProfileInfo vengono costruiti e restituiti come parte di un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>dal <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>e i <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>metodi di un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> oggetto per una classe che eredita il <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo?displayProperty=fullName> constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo?displayProperty=fullName>costruttore non è destinato a essere utilizzato dal codice.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare invece <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects are constructed and returned as part of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>gli oggetti vengono costruiti e restituiti come parte di un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>dal <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>e i <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>metodi di un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo"> </xref> classe con i valori di proprietà specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> object is used to represent information about a user profile from the data store, including the last date and time when profile properties were retrieved or updated, the user name associated with the profile, and whether the profile is for an anonymous or authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>oggetto viene utilizzato per rappresentare le informazioni relative a un profilo utente dall'archivio dati, tra cui la data e ora sono state recuperate le proprietà del profilo o aggiornato, il nome utente associato al profilo, l'ultima e se il profilo è associato a un utente autenticato o anonimo.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects are constructed and returned as a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods of a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>gli oggetti vengono costruiti e restituiti come un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>dal <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>e i <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>metodi di un <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>

trans-unit.source: The user name for the profile.
trans-unit.target: Il nome utente per il profilo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the profile is for an anonymous user; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate the profile is for an authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che il profilo è per un utente anonimo. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per indicare il profilo è per un utente autenticato.

trans-unit.source: The last date and time when the profile was read or updated.
trans-unit.target: L'ultima data e ora, quando il profilo è stato letto o aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: The last date and time when the profile was updated.
trans-unit.target: L'ultima data e ora quando il profilo è stato aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: The size of the profile information and values stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dimensioni delle informazioni sul profilo e i valori archiviati nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the user name for the profile is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il nome utente per il profilo è anonimo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user name for the profile is anonymous; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il nome utente per il profilo è anonimo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last date and time when the profile was read or updated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ultima data e ora, quando il profilo è stato letto o aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last date and time when the profile was read or updated.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime>che rappresenta l'ultima data e ora, quando il profilo è stato letto o aggiornato.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the last date and time when the profile was updated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ultima data e ora quando il profilo è stato aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last date and time when the profile was updated.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime>che rappresenta l'ultima data e ora quando il profilo è stato aggiornato.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the profile property names and values stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni dei nomi di proprietà profilo e i valori archiviati nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> calculates the size of the profile as the total size of the string and binary columns that store the profile property values and the column that stores the profile property names.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>Calcola le dimensioni del profilo come le dimensioni totali delle colonne stringa e binari che archiviano i valori delle proprietà del profilo e la colonna che archivia i nomi delle proprietà di profilo.</xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>

trans-unit.source: The size of the columns is determined using the SQL Server DATALENGTH function.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni delle colonne vengano determinata tramite la funzione DATALENGTH di SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: The size of the profile property names and values stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni dei nomi di proprietà profilo e i valori archiviati nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name for the profile.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome utente per il profilo.

trans-unit.source: The user name for the profile.
trans-unit.target: Il nome utente per il profilo.
